metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17663 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The htpasswd implementation of mini_httpd before v1.28 and of thttpd before v2.28 is affected by a buffer overflow that can be exploited remotely to perform code execution.

criterions.comment: mini-httpd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30-2').
